title: How Stoicism Can Help You Have Soul in the Game - Ep 159
itunes:title: How Stoicism Can Help You Have Soul in the Game - Ep 159
description:
Vitaliy dives deep into how Stoicism helps him on a day to day basis, discusses some Stoic heroes, and the link between mindfulness and Stoicism.

Enjoy!

You can read this article online here: https://contrarianedge.com/how-stoicism-can-help-you-have-soul-in-the-game/
